About Me

Let me tell you a few things...

BIO

As a Full Stack and Front End Developer I have worked closely with the project team managers to develop Cross-Platform Distributed Systems. My contributions included creating a Responsive Monolithic Websites, CMS Integration, and building JavaScript Reuseable Components for many Web Applications.

Homesite Insurance

Full Stack Developer

I have Customized UI design with Javascript, Bootstrap, Figma, jQuery, and CSS for external users to create applications and Implement Web APIs using Ajax JSON I have participated in Agile methodology cycle and weekly meetings Used TFS and VSS version controlling, involved in requirements gathering, analyzing, designing and implementing various software using Core ava, JEE, Spring, Hibernate and various databases

Infosys

Front End Developer

Implemented and designed user interface for web-based customer application. Designed UI with Bootstrap, jQuery, CSS and Razor View engine for external users to create applications Implemented Web APIs and call using Ajax JSON Involved in Agile methodology cycle and weekly meetings Used TFS and VSS version controlling, involved in requirements gathering, analyzing, designing and implementing various software using Core java, JEE, Spring, Hibernate and various databases.

V3 Main Technologies

Full Stack Developer

I have followed Agile methodology and been involved in daily Scrum meetings, sprint planning, showcases and retrospective and used JIRA as a tracking tool for the sprints.
